name: perform-crispr-cas9-genome-editing
title: CRISPR-Cas9 Genome Editing Simulator
description: Simulate CRISPR-Cas9 genome editing including guide RNA design, delivery, and analysis
content:
Overview

This application simulates the CRISPR-Cas9 genome editing process. Built using Biomni, it validates guide RNAs, identifies target sites, simulates delivery and editing outcomes.

Features

  • Validates guide RNA sequences and checks GC content
  • Identifies target sites and PAM sequences
  • Simulates cell-specific delivery efficiency
  • Predicts editing outcomes and indel formation
  • Generates detailed research logs

Parameters

  • Guide RNA Sequences: Comma-separated list of 20-nucleotide guide RNAs
  • Target Genomic Loci: Target genomic sequence containing guide RNA sites
  • Cell/Tissue Type: Type of cell being edited (affects delivery efficiency)

Output

The application generates a detailed research log and saves original and modified sequences to crispr_results/ directory.

Use Cases

  • Planning CRISPR experiments
  • Guide RNA validation
  • Predicting editing outcomes
  • Teaching genome editing concepts
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python "prod_apps/biomni/bioengineering/perform_crispr_cas9_genome_editing.py" "${guideRnaSequences}" "${targetGenomicLoci}" "${cellTissueType}"
